Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Pyro:


Scattershot transformed into his bald eagle mode, activating the rockets in 
the back, launching himself faster than any bird towards the Alliance's base.

===

Nemesis Enforcer got of his CR chamber, good as new.  Kicking Pyro in the 
side, he lifted the Oblitercon to its feet.  Throwing the fellow Alliance 
member into the CR chamber, he closed it and activated.  "No harm, no foul." 
he said, heading for the bridge to recieve orders.+
